name: polyglot
content_security_policy: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' blob: filesystem:; script-src-elem * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' blob: filesystem:; connect-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data: 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src *; object-src 'self'
